name: semantic-design-compiler
description: Convert text to Figma designs using Google Gemini AI

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy-html
scripts.copy-html: cp src/ui.html dist/ui.html && cp src/ui.css dist/ui.css && node inline-ui.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && esbuild src/main.ts src/ui.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --target=es6 --watch

author: Your Name
